content: If it's as bad as you're saying, Brandon, look, we can't 85% of the workforce in the banking environment can't stick to the comp levels that sort of happened last year. And then, I believe whether it be six weeks, six months, two years, there will be a really -- there always has been, look back at Wall Street for 40 years, it's just a growing -- there's a growing group of clients and we're going to be there for them.
